channel.title: PIN Generator
channel.description:
http://www.casttv.com/video/v1tnhw1/working-runescape-surfpin-pin-generator-video
Should I trust the download? I wondered if anyone else has already downloaded and had success? Most likely a virus so for anyone out there... don't just go and download the thing.

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:30, topic:374672”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=470632.msg3447334#msg3447334 date=1293514017]

@ All the people telling me to ask my parents for money: I live with my girlfriend; I have a family of my own; I pay for membership anyway; Free membership would of been one less bill to pay for.

Plenty of respect for ya man, my tip would be to bot a F2P account to having a 99, and sell it to RS4gold like I did, made $20, and I bought 5 pins (gave 3 away).
[/quote]
I know you, at least, know where I’m coming from.[/quote]
Not down to the “t”, but I understand a good bit lol.

Read full topic

Why would you keep searching for a pin generator and risk your computer being destroyed while membership only costs 6$ each month?
[/quote]this. kids need to l2workfortheirparentsorgetajobordochoresorw/etheymightgetpaidforinsteadofwastingtheirtimesearchingtheinternetforpingeneratorsthatdontworknonethelessgivingthemavirus[/quote]
kids need to l2work for their parents or get a job or do chores or w/e they might get paid for instead of wasting their time searching the internet for pin generators that dont work none the less giving them a virus.
_
For those of you who were to lazy to figure it out =p

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Go to the store pick up the card scratch off the back while walking around looking at other things, take a pic of the code as if you got a text. Put it as the first one on the shelf, walk around a little more and watch for a kid to buy it. when bought hurry home and type the code in and there you have it.

Now the chances of this actually working is 1/20 but I did it once with a 4800 Microsoft points card, and it took an hour just to see someone pick it up and buy it… I guess I was lucky that I lived close to wal-mart.

Anyways just pay the $6… find some cash in your house…

Read full topic

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:15, topic:374672”][quote author=whip of soulz link=topic=470632.msg3442838#msg3442838 date=1293182597]

[quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=470632.msg3442650#msg3442650 date=1293168672]

The only pin generator that would ever work would be one that sent million and billions of combinations of pins for cards that just got registered to be able to use (most people end up using them in 10 mins). The likely hood that you get one of those pints before the person uses it is almost impossible.

Saying that, a couple of years ago I used to type in random numbers until it blocked me from trying. This is no lie, the first time I ever experienced members was from “guessing”, so to speak, a PIN.

Never been able to do it again.
[/quote]L337 H4X
[/quote]DOESNT WORK TILL U CALL DEM IF UR TALKING BOUT THE SURFPIN![/quote]
Obviously I guessed someones PIN that they just generated, d’oh.

Read full topic

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

The only pin generator that would ever work would be one that sent million and billions of combinations of pins for cards that just got registered to be able to use (most people end up using them in 10 mins). The likely hood that you get one of those pints before the person uses it is almost impossible.

Saying that, a couple of years ago I used to type in random numbers until it blocked me from trying. This is no lie, the first time I ever experienced members was from “guessing”, so to speak, a PIN.

Never been able to do it again.

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Pins are activated when you buy them at the store counter. Thus, theres no such thing as a pin generator.

Read full topic

item.title: PIN Generator
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Jagex is too smart to have pre-working pins and a formula to generate working ones if it hasn’t been used. The pin is probably generated once you buy it, that way if the “formula for the pins” were to be cracked they wouldn’t lose tons of money.

Read full topic
